title: APT ORB / foreclosed apt logic
description: Logic wonders what happened in this apartment.

links.title: You: "You can't foreclose on an apartment..."
links.english: You can't foreclose on an apartment with a hole in the wall.
links.polish: Nie można przejąć mieszkania z dziurą w ścianie.
links.belarusian: Немагчыма засяліцца ў кватэру з дзіркай у сцяне.

links.title: Logic: "It will still be accessible through..."
links.english: It will still be accessible through the apartment next to it. That one didn't have a door... Sadly, nothing of great value remains here.
links.polish: Wciąż będzie dostępne przez mieszkanie obok. To, które nie miało drzwi... Niestety, nie zostało tu nic o jakiejkolwiek sensownej wartości.
links.belarusian: Усё яшчэ будзе даступна праз кватэру побач. Тую, у якой не было дзвярэй... На жаль, тут не засталося нічога якой-небудзь сэнсоўнай вартасці.

links.title: You: "Except the stuff in the fridge."
links.english: Except the stuff in the fridge.

links.title: You: "There's always a little something i..."
links.english: There's always a little something in the fridge.
links.polish: W lodówce zawsze jest jakiś drobiazg.
links.belarusian: У халадзільніку заўсёды ёсць нейкая дробязь.

links.title: Logic: "Put your emotions aside. Try to foc..."
links.english: Put your emotions aside. Try to focus on abstract, impersonal things.
links.polish: Odłóż emocje na bok. Spróbuj skupić się na rzeczach abstrakcyjnych, niezwiązanych z ludźmi.
links.belarusian: Адкладзі эмоцыі ўбок. Паспрабуй засяродзіцца на абстрактных рэчах, не звязаных з людзьмі.

links.title: Inland Empire: "But this reeks of sadness!"
links.polish: Ale tu aż cuchnie od smutku!
